Summary: Cigar Form UFO, aprox distance from the ground: 20.000 ft, stationary
trends: There have been no other sightings in Itu
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my brother were in the car while my mother was driving, I was lookimg to the sky (in a 70��� inclination from the ground) through the window, when the car stopped the object continued stationary, it was bright and shiny, my brother did also see it, we both calculate a distance of approx. 20.000 miles or 6-10km from the ground. The object was too big, about 1 mile of length and 100 meters height, it was a bit inclined in a upwards direction and was absolutely stationary. We both were delighted with such view, I'am 22 years old and he is 20 years old. After about 10 seconds this giant object was gone. There were no clouds and the sky was absolutely blue and beautiful, it could not be a balloon nor an airplane because of the calculated high and distance from the ground.
